features: 🥰A Modern Simple Floor Lamp for Any Home Décor: This floor lamp can function both as a daily lighting and a decoration that enhances the ambiance of your home. This LED floor lamp, with its natural linen shade, offers gentle illumination, caring for your eyes while serving as an elegant decorative standing lamp for your living room, office, and bedroom. Its sleek and stylish design allows it to complement industrial, traditional, American, European, and other styles seamlessly.

👍Bedroom Floor Lamps with Pull Chain Design: The living room floor lamp has a convenient pull chain. Placed behind your couch or recliner, this corner floor lamp allows easy on/off control with a single pull of the chain. This makes it the most user-friendly room light option for reading, studying, or working. Additionally, the tall floor lamp is compatible with smart devices, enabling you to adjust the lighting from the comfort of your sofa or bed. (Smart devices and bulb not included)

💡Space-saving Standing Lamp: Our bedside pole lamp is meticulously designed with dimensions of 60.62 inches by 8.66 inches. This black floor lamp can be effortlessly positioned in a corner, behind a sofa, or next to a TV, bed, fireplace, or reading corner, offering a practical and versatile lighting solution for small rooms or apartments without occupying excessive visual space. This lamp is both affordable and functional, particularly when you need a bright floor lamp for a dark corner.

💛E26 Based Sturdy Floor Lamp& Easy Installation: Choose any standard E26 base bulb you like (warm white, daylight, 3 colors or a RGB bulb. Note: bulb not included and MAX support 60W.) The base of our stand up lamps is made of high-quality metal, which is sturdy and tip-resistant for children and pet. Assembly of this floor light is a breeze, requiring no tools. Simply insert the poles and base together, clip onto the metal ring to form a lampshade, install the lampshade and bulb.

🎁Gift Choice & Warranty: Our minimalist floor lamp is simple in shape and easy to operate, which makes it a great gift idea for family and friends, especially serves as a house warming gift or holiday/birthday presents. We offer 12 months of quality service and are available to answer any questions you may have through Amazon message box or e-mail in 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why should you choose the FOLKSMATE basic foor lamp? Have you feel inconvenient to have limited lighting especially in corners or reading nooks where overhead lighting may fall short? Have you thought about how a floor lamp can elevate your home's style and interior decor? If you have, then look no further than the FOLKSMATE floor lamp! We are a dedicated retailer that specializes in offering lighting products. Our aim is to establish a reputable brand of floor lamps and strive to become a prominent presence in the industry. This simple floor lamp is our handpicked classic modern lighting solution for any home. This black floor lamp is designed to provide sufficient lighting even in corners. Use it as a illumination next to your living room couch or tv, a functional floor reading lamp for your office, or an elegant decorative standing lamp in bedroom. Its flexibility knows no bounds! It is a classic floor lamp that can meet people’s various preferences and complement any interior design styles. With this contemporary floor lamp, you can enhance the visual appeal of your living spaces and create a more visually pleasing environment.

Floor lamp for working Easy light up your home with bright and neat light by using daylight white bulb. This simple floor lamp can provide sufficient lighting in dark corners beside your living room couch or ample lighting for your office working table. Floor lamp for reading Use warm white bulb as a cozy lamp for reading nooks. The lampshade of the floor lamp is made of high-quality linen, emitting a soft and gentle light that protects your family members and children from discomfort caused by harsh lighting.

Premium Linen Shade The lampshade of the floor lamp is made of natural linen, emitting a soft and gentle light withour harsh lighting. Perfect cozy lamp for beside. Pull Chain Design The bedroom floor lamp with a smooth pull-chain switch that allows you to easy operate and add a touch of convenience to your daily routine. Standard E26 base Bulb not included, please choose an E26 base bulb for this standing lamp. Max support 60W. Compatible with smart devices. Sturdy Metal Base Our floor lamp bases are made of high quality metal. it adopts good stability, which is safe for your children and pet.
Previous page Next page 1 Lamp for Living Room 2 Floor Lamp for Office 3 Kid Room Floor Lamp 4 Reading Floor Lamp 5 An Awesome Gift Idea

Floor lamps for living room Simple and Modern This kid floor lamp is equipped with a convenient pull chain switch and is compatible with smart devices. The stylish pull chain switch makes it easy to turn the lamp on or off, adding a touch of convenience to your daily routine. Moreover, this standing light can be used with smart plugs, allowing seamless integration with smart home systems. Experience the ease and automation of modern living! Floor Lamp for home Easy Installation 1. Remove wire cover and install the poles. 2. Assemble the lampshade. 3. Lampshade clip onto the metal ring. 4. Unscrew the fixing ring. 5. Screw the fixing ring to fix the lampshade. 6 Install the bulb. (Bulb NOT included)

Light up your sweet home! If you have any other questions, We are always here for you. More details you may want to know:1. This lamp is compatible with smart devices.（Need to seperate purchase and bulb NOT included) 2. The color of the lampshade is linen. 3. The height of the lamp is 60.62 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value floor lamp in modern times!
reviews.reviewText: I needed extra lighting in a bedroom that am converting into a sort of walk in closet. I needed light in areas that weren’t previously lit, I needed floor lamps, and I needed them to look unobtrusively nice. Also, I wanted to pay as little as possible.This floor lamp!I was able to buy 2, in the linen shade, for just $20 each.Look, this is an inexpensive lamp but: the assembly was easy, the base is substantial and it does exactly what it is supposed to do: light things up.No one is going to mistake the lamp for a high end lamp. This is not the centerpiece for your living room but, a living room corner behind a couch, why not? If people aren’t on top of it, they won’t notice anything but a pleasant warm glow.It’s pretty small, I guess, but it’s tall enough for what I needed and perfect for my use. Amazing value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price. Sturdy and Looks great in my living room. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this floor lamp when it was on sale. I needed something simple for my way too dark living room. This offered decent value and looks similar to a lamp I have in the bedroom. It's just a shade over 5' high and that works well as I'm a wheelchair user and can easily reach it.I appreciated that this has a shade that is tan rather than the usual white. I also like that this has a pull chain to turn it on rather than the usual foot button. It does not have an actual light switch - only the chain (as pictured).This was fairly easily to assemble. Directions provided were abysmal. I wasn't fond of the process of unrolling the shade and then assembling it. That gave it a look that makes it obvious this is a more entry-level floor lamp. It is cheap and it really kind of looks cheap.This is reportedly compatible with smart devices, though I haven't explored it.The black base is made of metal. The black poles to assemble the lamp are MUCH thinner than I expected. Sturdy is not a word I would use, though it stands up just fine. I'm not sure I could recommend this to a home with small children as the poles are light enough that you could pretty easily knock this over.This uses E26 bulbs and a bulb is not included.I like this lamp, though I like perhaps a little less than I expected. It's a solid entry-level floor lamp, however, that's how it's priced and that's what should be expected. It works perfectly fine for me, however, it's a little less sturdy than I'd hoped and a little thinner than I'd like.That said, it's a solid entry-level floor lamp at a very affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What we needed!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought this for a little extra light in our living room. The way our couch sits, it doesn't allow for much and I didn't want to spend alot. This worked out perfect! It's not super sturdy but being behind my couch, it's hardly touched. The light it gives is "calming" and its a great height! Not a eye sore. Exactly what we needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent light for the price.
reviews.reviewText: First off, the lamp was simple and easy to put together, even after I put the lampshade on inside out and had to fix it. My bad. Uses standard LED bulbs, which we had on hand. The pull chain is easy to use, and is long enough that you can reach it comfortably while sitting in a recliner, which is nice. The base is heavy, meaning the kids are less likely to knock it over. Not the most amazing lamp, but does a nice job of lighting up a previously dark corner. Very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit My Space Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I needed a lamp to go in a corner behind my sofa. This lamp fit perfectly! It was fairly easy to assemble. Before starting to assemble, I suggest you read the directions and look at all the parts. No tools required. The lamp projects plenty of light for the whole room. I’m very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the Right Size Lamp
reviews.reviewText: We needed some floor lamps to save space and be at a better height for reading. These lamps are perfect for that. They come in a small box and you have to assemble. It's really easy. You have to remember to take off the black plastic ring and then the 12" long pieces will screw right in. They have a pull chain, which is handy. The shade is only about a 12" circumference and not a massive thing to get in the way. They're affordable and look nice. We highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very thin and weird shade
reviews.reviewText: The stem us as thin as my finger, sturdy round base. Shade is a roll that you clip onto the top frame. It works for what I needed but looks cheap
